name: Cobra Pinball
overview: Cobra Pinball: in two words, it is a computerized version of pinball. Mind-blowing realism thanks to a superb table and a whole series of details which go from “only for entertainment” to “more fun to compete” while passing by the “quartet” to insert in the slot before the part which one sees sliding. Bluff maybe, but you have to go there to play on your keyboard.
